headline: 3 Reasons MAS is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Masco’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 21.8% of its value and falling to $63.32 per share. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
